meanings.sent1: The teacher decided to preexempt the students from the final exam due to their excellent grades.
meanings.sent2: It is important to preexempt certain items from the list to avoid confusion later on.
meanings.sent3: The magician preexempted the rabbit from the hat before the show even began!
meanings.sent4: She always preexempts any potential issues by planning ahead.
meanings.sent5: The security guard preexempted any unauthorized entry by checking IDs at the door.

meanings.sent1: The preexempt items were clearly marked with a special label.
meanings.sent2: The preexempt passengers were allowed to board the plane first.
meanings.sent3: The preexempt cupcakes were saved for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The preexempt seats were reserved for VIP guests only.
meanings.sent5: The preexempt documents were securely stored in a locked cabinet.
